sentences: Maksku mis maksab, mina pean oma tahtmist saada.
Kool tuleb maksku mis maksab ära lõpetada.
Nad olid otsustanud temast maksku mis maksab lahti saada.
context: The phrase 'maksku mis maksab' is an Estonian expression meaning that something will be done regardless of the cost or consequences. It emphasizes determination and willingness to use all available methods to achieve a goal, without considering obstacles or expenses.
